info.title: EventHubManagementClient
info.description: Azure Event Hubs client for managing Event Hubs Cluster, IPFilter Rules and VirtualNetworkRules resources.

get.description: Lists all of the available Event Hub REST API operations.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the give Namespace name availability.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to check availability of the given Namespace name

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List the quantity of available pre-provisioned Event Hubs Clusters, indexed by Azure region.

default.description: Error response describing why available clusters could not be successfully listed.

get.description: Lists the available Event Hubs Clusters within an ARM resource group.

default.description: Event Hub Cluster error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the resource description of the specified Event Hubs Cluster.

200.description: Event Hubs Cluster resource description returned successfully.

default.description: Event Hubs Cluster error response describing why the cluster description get operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an instance of an Event Hubs Cluster.

200.description: Event Hubs Cluster successfully created or updated.

201.description: Event Hubs Cluster create or update request accepted.

202.description: Event Hubs Cluster create or update request accepted.

default.description: Event Hubs error response detailing why the Event Hubs Cluster create or update operation failed.

patch.description: Modifies mutable properties on the Event Hubs Cluster. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The properties of the Event Hubs Cluster which should be updated.

201.description: Event Hubs Cluster update request accepted.

202.description: Event Hubs Cluster update request accepted.

default.description: Event Hubs error response detailing why the Event Hubs Cluster update operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Event Hubs Cluster. This operation is idempotent.

202.description: Event Hubs Cluster delete request accepted.

default.description: Event Hubs error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Event Hubs Namespace Enumeration in Cluster
get.description: List all Event Hubs Namespace IDs in an Event Hubs Dedicated Cluster.

200.description: List of Namespace IDs in Cluster successfully delivered.

default.description: Event Hubs Cluster error response detailing why this operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for creating an Event Hubs Cluster resource.

patch.description: Replace all specified Event Hubs Cluster settings with those contained in the request body. Leaves the settings not specified in the request body unmodified.

200.description: Event Hubs Cluster settings configuration returned.

201.description: Event Hubs Cluster setting configuration request successfully accepted.

202.description: Event Hubs Cluster update request accepted.

default.description: Event Hubs Cluster error response describing why the get cluster quotas and settings operation failed.

get.description: Get all Event Hubs Cluster settings - a collection of key/value pairs which represent the quotas and settings imposed on the cluster.

200.description: Event Hubs Cluster settings configuration returned.

default.description: Event Hubs Cluster error response describing why the get cluster quotas and settings operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the available Namespaces within a subscription, irrespective of the resource groups.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the available Namespaces within a resource group.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for creating a namespace resource.

202.description: Namespace create or update request accepted.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated resources under the namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the description of the specified namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for updating a namespace resource.

202.description: Namespace create or update request accepted.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of IP Filter rules for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an IpFilterRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an IpFilterRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an IpFilterRule for a Namespace by rule name.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of VirtualNetwork rules for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an VirtualNetworkRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an VirtualNetworkRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an VirtualNetworkRule for a Namespace by rule name.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or update NetworkRuleSet for a Namespace.

default.description: ServiceBus error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets NetworkRuleSet for a Namespace.

default.description: ServiceBus error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets list of NetworkRuleSet for a Namespace.

200.description: List of NetworkRuleSets for Namespace successfully returned.

default.description: EventHub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace by rule name.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets the primary and secondary connection strings for the Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerates the primary or secondary connection strings for the specified Namespace.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters required to regenerate the connection string.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the give Namespace name availability.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to check availability of the given Alias name

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations) for eventhub namespace

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a new Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration)

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters required to create an Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration)

201.description: Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) creation request received

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Delete Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) request accepted

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) for primary or secondary namespace

200.description: Successfully retrieved the Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: This operation disables the Disaster Recovery and stops replicating changes from primary to secondary namespaces

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Invokes GEO DR failover and reconfigure the alias to point to the secondary namespace

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace by rule name.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets the primary and secondary connection strings for the Namespace.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the Event Hubs in a Namespace.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Event Hubs.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a new Event Hub as a nested resource within a Namespace.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create an Event Hub resource.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an Event Hub from the specified Namespace and resource group.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an Event Hubs description for the specified Event Hub.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the Event Hub description.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the authorization rules for an Event Hub.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an AuthorizationRule for the specified Event Hub. Creation/update of the AuthorizationRule will take a few seconds to take effect.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for an Event Hub by rule name.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.
Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets the ACS and SAS connection strings for the Event Hub.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerates the ACS and SAS connection strings for the Event Hub.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate the AuthorizationRule Keys (PrimaryKey/SecondaryKey).

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an Event Hubs consumer group as a nested resource within a Namespace.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update a consumer group resource.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a consumer group from the specified Event Hub and resource group.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a description for the specified consumer group.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the consumer group description.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the consumer groups in a Namespace. An empty feed is returned if no consumer group exists in the Namespace.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of consumer groups.

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the available Regions for a given sku

default.description: EventHub error response describing why the operation failed.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Event Hub operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Event Hub operations supported by the Microsoft.EventHub resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

Operation.description: A Event Hub REST API operation

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

created.description: The UTC time when the Event Hubs Cluster was created.

updated.description: The UTC time when the Event Hubs Cluster was last updated.

metricId.description: The metric ID of the cluster resource. Provided by the service and not modifiable by the user.

properties.description: Event Hubs Cluster properties supplied in responses in List or Get operations.

Cluster.description: Single Event Hubs Cluster resource in List or Get operations.

value.description: The count of readily available and pre-provisioned Event Hubs Clusters per region.

AvailableClustersList.description: The response of the List Available Clusters operation.

AvailableCluster.description: Pre-provisioned and readily available Event Hubs Cluster count per region.

value.description: The Event Hubs Clusters present in the List Event Hubs operation results.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Empty unless the value parameter contains an incomplete list of Event Hubs Clusters.

ClusterListResult.description: The response of the List Event Hubs Clusters operation.

settings.description: All possible Cluster settings - a collection of key/value paired settings which apply to quotas and configurations imposed on the cluster.

ClusterQuotaConfigurationProperties.description: Contains all settings for the cluster.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response that indicates the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

capacity.description: The quantity of Event Hubs Cluster Capacity Units contained in this cluster.

ClusterSku.description: SKU parameters particular to a cluster instance.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace IDs operation

EHNamespaceIdListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace IDs operation

EHNamespaceIdContainer.description: The full ARM ID of an Event Hubs Namespace

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of namespaces.

EHNamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation

createdAt.description: The time the Namespace was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the Namespace was updated.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations.

clusterArmId.description: Cluster ARM ID of the Namespace.

isAutoInflateEnabled.description: Value that indicates whether AutoInflate is enabled for eventhub namespace.

maximumThroughputUnits.description: Upper limit of throughput units when AutoInflate is enabled, value should be within 0 to 20 throughput units. ( '0' if AutoInflateEnabled = true)

kafkaEnabled.description: Value that indicates whether Kafka is enabled for eventhub namespace.

zoneRedundant.description: Enabling this property creates a Standard Event Hubs Namespace in regions supported availability zones.

properties.description: Namespace properties supplied for create namespace operation.

EHNamespace.description: Single Namespace item in List or Get Operation

tier.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU.

capacity.description: The Event Hubs throughput units, value should be 0 to 20 throughput units.

Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create namespace operation

properties.description: Properties supplied to create or update IpFilterRules

IpFilterRule.description: Single item in a List or Get IpFilterRules operation

value.description: Result of the List IpFilter Rules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains an incomplete list of IpFilter Rules

IpFilterRuleListResult.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

virtualNetworkSubnetId.description: ARM ID of Virtual Network Subnet

properties.description: Properties supplied to create or update VirtualNetworkRules

VirtualNetworkRule.description: Single item in a List or Get VirtualNetworkRules operation

value.description: Result of the List VirtualNetwork Rules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains an incomplete list of VirtualNetwork Rules

VirtualNetworkRuleListResult.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

id.description: Resource ID of Virtual Network Subnet

NWRuleSetIpRules.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

ignoreMissingVnetServiceEndpoint.description: Value that indicates whether to ignore missing Vnet Service Endpoint

NWRuleSetVirtualNetworkRules.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

defaultAction.description: Default Action for Network Rule Set

type.description: Enumerates the possible value Identity type, which currently supports only 'SystemAssigned'

Identity.description: Properties to configure Identity for Bring your Own Keys

keySource.description: Enumerates the possible value of keySource for Encryption

keyName.description: Name of the Key from KeyVault

value.description: Result of the List Authorization Rules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains an incomplete list of Authorization Rules

AuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

properties.description: Properties supplied to create or update AuthorizationRule

AuthorizationRule.description: Single item in a List or Get AuthorizationRule operation

primaryConnectionString.description: Primary connection string of the created namespace AuthorizationRule.

secondaryConnectionString.description: Secondary connection string of the created namespace AuthorizationRule.

aliasPrimaryConnectionString.description: Primary connection string of the alias if GEO DR is enabled

aliasSecondaryConnectionString.description: Secondary  connection string of the alias if GEO DR is enabled

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

keyName.description: A string that describes the AuthorizationRule.

key.description: Optional, if the key value provided, is set for KeyType or autogenerated Key value set for keyType

RegenerateAccessKeyParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Authorization Rule operation, specifies which key needs to be reset.

partitionIds.description: Current number of shards on the Event Hub.

createdAt.description: Exact time the Event Hub was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

messageRetentionInDays.description: Number of days to retain the events for this Event Hub, value should be 1 to 7 days

partitionCount.description: Number of partitions created for the Event Hub, allowed values are from 1 to 32 partitions.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of the Event Hub.

properties.description: Properties supplied to the Create Or Update Event Hub operation.

Eventhub.description: Single item in List or Get Event Hub operation

enabled.description: A value that indicates whether capture description is enabled.

encoding.description: Enumerates the possible values for the encoding format of capture description. Note: 'AvroDeflate' will be deprecated in New API Version

intervalInSeconds.description: The time window allows you to set the frequency with which the capture to Azure Blobs will happen, value should between 60 to 900 seconds

sizeLimitInBytes.description: The size window defines the amount of data built up in your Event Hub before an capture operation, value should be between 10485760 to 524288000 bytes

destination.description: Properties of Destination where capture will be stored. (Storage Account, Blob Names)

skipEmptyArchives.description: A value that indicates whether to Skip Empty Archives

CaptureDescription.description: Properties to configure capture description for eventhub

storageAccountResourceId.description: Resource id of the storage account to be used to create the blobs

archiveNameFormat.description: Blob naming convention for archive, e.g. {Namespace}/{EventHub}/{PartitionId}/{Year}/{Month}/{Day}/{Hour}/{Minute}/{Second}. Here all the parameters (Namespace,EventHub .. etc) are mandatory irrespective of order

properties.description: Properties describing the storage account, blob container and archive name format for capture destination

Destination.description: Capture storage details for capture description

value.description: Result of the List EventHubs operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of EventHubs.

EventHubListResult.description: The result of the List EventHubs operation.

createdAt.description: Exact time the message was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

userMetadata.description: User Metadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data with maximum length 1024. e.g. it can be used to store descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.

properties.description: Single item in List or Get Consumer group operation

ConsumerGroup.description: Single item in List or Get Consumer group operation

value.description: Result of the List Consumer Group operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Consumer Group

ConsumerGroupListResult.description: The result to the List Consumer Group operation.

UnavailableReason.description: Specifies the reason for the unavailability of the service.

name.description: Name to check the namespace name availability

CheckNameAvailabilityParameter.description: Parameter supplied to check Namespace name availability operation

message.description: The detailed info regarding the reason associated with the Namespace.

nameAvailable.description: Value indicating Namespace is availability, true if the Namespace is available; otherwise, false.

reason.description: The reason for unavailability of a Namespace.

CheckNameAvailabilityResult.description: The Result of the CheckNameAvailability operation

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) - possible values 'Accepted' or 'Succeeded' or 'Failed'

partnerNamespace.description: ARM Id of the Primary/Secondary eventhub namespace name, which is part of GEO DR pairing

alternateName.description: Alternate name specified when alias and namespace names are same.

role.description: role of namespace in GEO DR - possible values 'Primary' or 'PrimaryNotReplicating' or 'Secondary'

pendingReplicationOperationsCount.description: Number of entities pending to be replicated.

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Or Update Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

ArmDisasterRecovery.description: Single item in List or Get Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) operation

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration)

ArmDisasterRecoveryListResult.description: The result of the List Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) operation.

value.description: Result of the List MessagingRegions type.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of MessagingRegions.

MessagingRegionsListResult.description: The response of the List MessagingRegions operation.

value.description: Result of the List NetworkRuleSet operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of NetworkRuleSet.

NetworkRuleSetListResult.description: The response of the List NetworkRuleSet operation

subscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

clusterNameParameter.name: clusterName
clusterNameParameter.description: The name of the Event Hubs Cluster.

skipParameter.name: $skip
skipParameter.description: Skip is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skip parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

topParameter.name: $top
topParameter.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N usageDetails.
